sentences.sContent: Keeping things short and sweet not only shows people that you are concise and don't waffle, but that you also know what you want.
sentences.sContent_eng: Keeping things short and sweet not only shows people that you are concise and don't waffle, but that you also know what you want.
sentences.sCn: 亲切简洁的语言彰显了你简明的个性，不仅不会被误认为是在胡扯，还让对方知道你是一个了解自己想要什么的人。

sentences.sContent: He needs to be a lot clearer and firmer about how he will deal with America’s foes and rivals: his first instinct when Russia invaded Georgia was to waffle.
sentences.sContent_eng: He needs to be a lot clearer and firmer about how he will deal with America’s foes and rivals: his first instinct when Russia invaded Georgia was to waffle.
sentences.sCn: 他需要更加清楚以及坚定他将如何处理美国的敌人和竞争对手。 当俄罗斯入侵格鲁吉亚的时候，他的第一反应竟认为这是胡扯。
